alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Misty Fjords (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 1:23PM AKST until December 21 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of around 2 inches near Klawock and 4 to 7 inches along the highways, around 6 inches near Hyder. * WHERE...Hyder, Klawock Area and the upper elevation highways. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance of freezing rain at the beginning of the event Monday night with potential for a light glaze. Greatest snowfall rates expected Tuesday morning. Some mixing with rain is likely near sea level.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already occurring or imminent.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Misty Fjords
